title: Monroe Jordan impresses with soothing alt-R&B cut, "Jody"
body:
Monroe Jordan’s latest track, "Jody", takes listeners on a heartfelt journey through the trials and tribulations of a failing relationship. 

Jordan, a 22-year-old alternative R&B artist from Columbus, OH, has been making music since 2018. With gentle, soothing vocals and impassioned lyrics laid over minimalist acoustic guitar, “Jody” is a refreshingly genuine love song that stands out in the current sea of R&B music. 

As his third release this year, "Jody" proves Monroe Jordan is on a hot streak and shows no signs of stopping.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tvdc4WTe-jI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tvdc4WTe-jI)

*Written by Simon Deutsch*

title: DAOTOOL101#6: Real-Time Financing with Superfluid
body:
### Table of Contents

* What is Superfluid?
* Importance of Superfluid
* How to wrap your Crypto?
* How to start a Stream?
* How to claim crypto as a receiver?
* How to cancel an active stream?
* Summary
* Useful links

## What is Superfluid?

Superfluid is a smart contract framework on Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) networks that allows for the easy, secure, and fast transfer of assets In real time based on pre-determined rules set forth in agreements. With only one on-chain transaction, the money will flow directly from your wallet to the receiver's in real time--no further transactions are necessary. Superfluid enables constant token flows on-chain with no capital lockups. Money streams will continue perpetually until cancellation or the sender's balance runs out. Money streams can also have their stream rate updated at any time for even more flexibility.

Super fluid was designed with simplicity and ease-of-use in mind. To get started, all you have to do is select a contributor and input instructions. Then, the protocol will automatically follow the instructions that have been set forth. This makes it easy for everyone to get on board and use the system without any trouble.

**Note**: It's important to wrap your crypto in order to streamline payment.

### Importance of Superfluid

Paying people quickly for their work can help improve productivity by ensuring that there are no delays in payments that could lead to a dip in productivity. In the past, we didn't have the ability to finance contributor compensation in real time, but now we do. This also helps with automation when it comes to making monthly, recurring, or one-time payments.

Even further, a DAO can use superfluid to DCA into investments, liquidity pool or any subscriptions etc in a single transaction, which means no multiple gas fees.

Entering a financial agreement with someone can be a daunting task. Humans are also prone to making mistakes and being dishonest sometimes which can cause financial loss for the other party. Superfluid helps users to transfer assets in a fair and transparent way. A smart contract is deployed by the receiver and the sender transfers assets to an address associated with that contract. The assets are then sent to the receiver according to the predefined rules of the contract. Superfluid takes care of execution and enforcement. It allows users to enjoy the speed of executing a trade while taking care of the complexities so they don't have to.

[https://twitter.com/Superfluid_HQ/status/1551642991214972938?s=20&t=udeOMGTxr6j53kW7deL2VQ](https://twitter.com/Superfluid_HQ/status/1551642991214972938?s=20&t=udeOMGTxr6j53kW7deL2VQ)

### How to wrap your Crypto?

1\. Login to your Gnosis safe account and Go to Apps section

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/56ox3Irkpte3yIUbILFx5.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Search `Superfluid` and Select It

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/R_a6zlQ8EsL1_k_U2shsv.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. Before using a 3rd party app with gnosis, you must read and agree to the Disclaimers and other precautions. Click `Continue` to proceed.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bYDTJIN6w7U7xOSrcmzXr.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. Click on `Continue`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iVhhueHWmEn_V-0R4FvyQ.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. You will be Logged in to the Superfluid Dashboard. Click on `Wrap` 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fcrS2HcvvcubPIdYnkIpR.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. Choose the cryptocurrency you want to wrap and input the amount you want to convert. After that, click on `Upgrade to Super Token`.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/563MJ2XYuFuKxgNqLXaez.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

7\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tEHdKdh-9gdwGRhtD7Xuu.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

8\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/js7hR36DOs-MofbWH82Uo.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

9\. You have Successfully wrapped the Crypto!!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1CXKsA3LMiYnp-vLaZxly.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to start a Stream?

1\. To Start a Stream after you have wrapped the Crypto, go to the left-hand side of your screen and look for the tab labelled `Send Stream`.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MSS62VT9xNsql4D5OWEhF.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Input the details and parameters

Note: Be careful with how the Cancellation works

> I understand that if **I have to cancel the stream before my balance reaches zero or else I will be liquidated and lose my buffer.**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PWkuh8ybzYKdQx4V2Ott5.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. Review and Click on `Send`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0JnrMiN_KS7ZZ8H5fo5La.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/o7g3FYaB4mzFD4zyDZhmM.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JSs_N-nIE0uV6K5gX8CRM.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. You have Successfully Created the Stream!!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w77cWoBuuJ4V0w7mcfyNt.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to claim Crypto as a Receiver?

1\. Head over to the [Official site](https://www.superfluid.finance/home) and Click on `Get Started`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NDqJlrjF5zG8YiHa08Jnp.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Click on `Go to dashboard`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QgxmYUMya0yn1rzvHnV_d.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. `Connect` your Wallet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xWFVki9BeYd6K9HyOTjP6.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. Select your account and click on `Next`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eagBEbTdOvqlYh-8pcujv.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. Click on `Connect` only after double checking the site URL

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RWtAqS9mfHkcQkjLma26j.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. You will be Logged Into Superfluid. Go to `Wrap/Unwrap` Section

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DhJtXgfsVX-W7flQVp_qU.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

7\. Go to `Unwrap` Section as the receiving Crypto is in Wrapped form(Super token)

Note: My current balance is 1.1212 MATIC

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/C8CeC2ajEmrrDBZusripi.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

8\. Choose the Crypto you want to Unwrap, fill In the amount and then Click on `Downgrade`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rMnz6erne2dF4nVQyT6JJ.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

9\. `Confirm` the Transaction

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tVDQOK8cDvVkQ-FWFZM5z.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

10\. You have successfully Unwrapped and Claimed the Crypto.

You can view It In your Activity History and Wallet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xQO3_tgw6epAQMyLYmp_m.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to cancel an active stream?

1\. To cancel an active stream, select the Super Token In which streaming is happening.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KAeqwgxkWkNa_TTZW_-fR.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

 2. Select the stream you want to cancel and click on `Cancel Stream` 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s1t79zPqD3_1w3uaHgWlm.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tTqKm9uLhpAcO7cp6UQTk.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3LklJ-JECiJap0ogUcyzg.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. You have successfully Cancelled the stream.

You can view It In your Activity History 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Evobe83ZsdfxwK8AP_bMO.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### Summary

Superfluid is a blockchain-based platform that makes it easy for DAOs to fund their contributors in a trustless, fast and transparent way. The platform has an easy to use front end that allows for real-time financing and payments using smart contracts.

**Useful links**

[Website](https://www.superfluid.finance/home)

[GitHub](https://github.com/superfluid-finance)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/intent/follow?screen_name=Superfluid_HQ)

[Discord](https://discord.com/invite/XsK7nahanQ)

[DOC](https://docs.superfluid.finance/superfluid/)

title: DAOTOOL101#6: Real-Time Financing with Superfluid
body:
### Table of Contents

* What is Superfluid?
* Importance of Superfluid
* How to wrap your Crypto?
* How to start a Stream?
* How to claim crypto as a receiver?
* How to cancel an active stream?
* Summary
* FAQ
* Useful links

## What is Superfluid?

Superfluid is a smart contract framework on Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) networks that allows for the easy, secure, and fast transfer of assets In real time based on pre-determined rules set forth in agreements. With only one on-chain transaction, the money will flow directly from your wallet to the receiver's in real time--no further transactions are necessary. Superfluid enables constant token flows on-chain with no capital lockups. Money streams will continue perpetually until cancellation or the sender's balance runs out. Money streams can also have their stream rate updated at any time for even more flexibility.

Super fluid was designed with simplicity and ease-of-use in mind. To get started, all you have to do is select a contributor and input instructions. Then, the protocol will automatically follow the instructions that have been set forth. This makes it easy for everyone to get on board and use the system without any trouble.

**Note**: It's important to wrap your crypto in order to streamline payment.

### Importance of Superfluid

Paying people quickly for their work can help improve productivity by ensuring that there are no delays in payments that could lead to a dip in productivity. In the past, we didn't have the ability to finance contributor compensation in real time, but now we do. This also helps with automation when it comes to making monthly, recurring, or one-time payments.

Even further, a DAO can use superfluid to DCA into investments, liquidity pool or any subscriptions etc in a single transaction, which means no multiple gas fees.

Entering a financial agreement with someone can be a daunting task. Humans are also prone to making mistakes and being dishonest sometimes which can cause financial loss for the other party. Superfluid helps users to transfer assets in a fair and transparent way. A smart contract is deployed by the receiver and the sender transfers assets to an address associated with that contract. The assets are then sent to the receiver according to the predefined rules of the contract. Superfluid takes care of execution and enforcement. It allows users to enjoy the speed of executing a trade while taking care of the complexities so they don't have to.

[https://twitter.com/Superfluid_HQ/status/1551642991214972938?s=20&t=udeOMGTxr6j53kW7deL2VQ](https://twitter.com/Superfluid_HQ/status/1551642991214972938?s=20&t=udeOMGTxr6j53kW7deL2VQ)

### How to wrap your Crypto?

1\. Login to your Gnosis safe account and Go to Apps section

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/56ox3Irkpte3yIUbILFx5.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Search `Superfluid` and Select It

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/R_a6zlQ8EsL1_k_U2shsv.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. Before using a 3rd party app with gnosis, you must read and agree to the Disclaimers and other precautions. Click `Continue` to proceed.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bYDTJIN6w7U7xOSrcmzXr.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. Click on `Continue`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iVhhueHWmEn_V-0R4FvyQ.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. You will be Logged in to the Superfluid Dashboard. Click on `Wrap` 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fcrS2HcvvcubPIdYnkIpR.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. Choose the cryptocurrency you want to wrap and input the amount you want to convert. After that, click on `Upgrade to Super Token`.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/563MJ2XYuFuKxgNqLXaez.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

7\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tEHdKdh-9gdwGRhtD7Xuu.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

8\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/js7hR36DOs-MofbWH82Uo.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

9\. You have Successfully wrapped the Crypto!!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1CXKsA3LMiYnp-vLaZxly.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to start a Stream?

1\. To Start a Stream after you have wrapped the Crypto, go to the left-hand side of your screen and look for the tab labelled `Send Stream`.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MSS62VT9xNsql4D5OWEhF.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Input the details and parameters

Note: Be careful with how the Cancellation works

> I understand that if **I have to cancel the stream before my balance reaches zero or else I will be liquidated and lose my buffer.**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PWkuh8ybzYKdQx4V2Ott5.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. Review and Click on `Send`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0JnrMiN_KS7ZZ8H5fo5La.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/o7g3FYaB4mzFD4zyDZhmM.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JSs_N-nIE0uV6K5gX8CRM.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. You have Successfully Created the Stream!!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w77cWoBuuJ4V0w7mcfyNt.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to claim Crypto as a Receiver?

1\. Head over to the [Official site](https://www.superfluid.finance/home) and Click on `Get Started`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NDqJlrjF5zG8YiHa08Jnp.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Click on `Go to dashboard`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QgxmYUMya0yn1rzvHnV_d.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. `Connect` your Wallet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xWFVki9BeYd6K9HyOTjP6.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. Select your account and click on `Next`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eagBEbTdOvqlYh-8pcujv.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. Click on `Connect` only after double checking the site URL

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RWtAqS9mfHkcQkjLma26j.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. You will be Logged Into Superfluid. Go to `Wrap/Unwrap` Section

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DhJtXgfsVX-W7flQVp_qU.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

7\. Go to `Unwrap` Section as the receiving Crypto is in Wrapped form(Super token)

Note: My current balance is 1.1212 MATIC

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/C8CeC2ajEmrrDBZusripi.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

8\. Choose the Crypto you want to Unwrap, fill In the amount and then Click on `Downgrade`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rMnz6erne2dF4nVQyT6JJ.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

9\. `Confirm` the Transaction

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tVDQOK8cDvVkQ-FWFZM5z.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

10\. You have successfully Unwrapped and Claimed the Crypto.

You can view It In your Activity History and Wallet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xQO3_tgw6epAQMyLYmp_m.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to cancel an active stream?

1\. To cancel an active stream, select the Super Token In which streaming is happening.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KAeqwgxkWkNa_TTZW_-fR.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

 2. Select the stream you want to cancel and click on `Cancel Stream` 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s1t79zPqD3_1w3uaHgWlm.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tTqKm9uLhpAcO7cp6UQTk.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3LklJ-JECiJap0ogUcyzg.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. You have successfully Cancelled the stream.

You can view It In your Activity History 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Evobe83ZsdfxwK8AP_bMO.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### Summary

Superfluid is a blockchain-based platform that makes it easy for DAOs to fund their contributors in a trustless, fast and transparent way. The platform has an easy to use front end that allows for real-time financing and payments using smart contracts.

**FAQ**

* **Which chains is Superfluid deployed to?** 

Deployed on L2s: Polygon, Gnosis chain, Arbitrum, Optimism and Avalanche.

* **What is the deposit when starting the stream?**

  It is an amount equivalent to 4-hours worth of your stream flow rate. It will be locked into the protocol and you will get it back when you close the stream before your wallet balance hits zero. Streams can’t stop themselves automatically, users need to stop them before their balance hits zero. If the user doesn’t stop their stream before their account balance hits zero, they lose the deposit/buffer.
* **Why did my stream get liquidated? Why did I lose my deposit?** 

  Streams can’t stop themselves automatically, users need to stop them before their balance hits zero. If the user doesn’t stop their stream before their account balance hits zero, they lose the deposit/buffer.
* **My stream got rejected or failed. What should I do?** 

  Try to follow the steps here: <https://help.superfluid.finance/en/articles/5852994-resolving-transaction-rejected-or-failed-errors> 
* **Can I choose any existing ERC-20 token for a Superfluid stream?** 

  Yes, superfluid is agnostic as to which token you use.

**Useful links**

[Website](https://www.superfluid.finance/home)

[GitHub](https://github.com/superfluid-finance)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/intent/follow?screen_name=Superfluid_HQ)

title: 以太坊的介绍 堆金积玉 学习笔记
body:
区块链的特点

去中心化：数据不在单一的数据库中，而是储存于多个分散的节点中，节点越多信息就越不容易被篡改

透明：项目代码开源，交易数据可查（注：与区块链保护隐私不矛盾，个人身份用密码学隐藏，例如交易数据中查不到某人转账多少比特币，只能查到某地址转账多少比特币）

不可篡改：通过在数字文档上加盖时间戳（证明数据在某个特定时间之前已经完整存在的）实现

………………………………………………

合约：书面或口头的共识，由法律保证强制执行

智能合约：数字化形式的合约，由计算机程序执行；由于代码自动运行，便不再需要依靠法律的强制力

执行智能合约的环境：以太坊虚拟机EVM，运行在每个以太坊节点中

以太坊节点记录的内容：交易信息+智能合约和应用程序的状态

………………………………………………

以太坊：下一代加密货币与去中心化应用平台

创始人：Vitalik Buterin

编程语言：Solidity，方便于编写智能合约

特点：开源项目，任何人都能在以太坊上创建和使用去中心化应用程序（Dapps），Dapps一旦上传到以太坊，将始终按照编好的程序运行，可用于控制数字资产

………………………………………………

Dapps与传统网站的区别

传统网站：前端→API→数据库，后端代码运行在中央服务器上

DApp的网站：前端→智能合约→区块链，后端代码运行在去中心化的P2P网络上

………………………………………………

Vitalik对Dapps的分类：

金融应用：使用户更好的管理钱和用钱去参与合约，比如金融产品及其衍生品，借贷等

半金融应用：将一些本身并非金融应用的服务与金融、支付用例结合起来，比如链游

非金融应用：例如在线投票和去中心化治理，不涉及财务层面

………………………………………………

以太币和比特币的区别

比特币Bitcoin：对法币失去信任的结果，可作为一般流通货币，比特币上限2100万，具有抗通胀属性，被比作crypto中的黄金

以太币Ether：作用是给以太坊的运作提供动力，激励人们在以太坊上维护数据，以太币没有数量上限，被比作crypto中的石油

………………………………………………

Gas费：在以太坊上执行操作，譬如发起交易，会消耗计算和存储资源，由此需要付Gas费给矿工

运作逻辑：用户支付的Gas费越高，就有更多节点优先处理操作，能够避免遇上区块拥堵（类似现实中出1元一般没有人送货，出100元就有很多人抢单）

作用：执行任何操作都需要支付gas费，防止有人白嫖从而浪费网络资源；即使交易失败，用户仍需为矿工已完成的工作支付gas费，防止恶意攻击网络

………………………………………………

Gas费的单位：Gwei（1 Gwei = 0.000000001 ETH）

计算公式（2021年8月伦敦升级后）：Gas Fee = ( Base + Priority ) \* Gas Limit

Base Fee由系统设定，这部分会被销毁掉，保证流通中的以太币不会只增无减

Priority Fee支付给矿工，用户可以自行设定，其高低会影响交易速度

Gas Limit指用户愿意为操作支付的Gas数量上限，一般钱包会自动设置，太少会导致交易失败；若实际消耗的数量少于Gas Limit，则没有消耗的Gas费会自动退还

Gas费估算查询 https://etherscan.io/gastracker

………………………………………………

Erc20：以太坊上的一种代币标准，允许开发者在以太坊上开发代币，规定了一系列标准，比如代币名称、代币总量、小数点位数等。创建Erc20代币必须遵守Erc20标准，如果不遵守，譬如想不给代币命名，或把代币总量设为无限大，那么便不能创建成功。

作用：使开发者能够高效可靠，低成本地开发专属自己项目的代币；使各种资产能用于不同的项目和平台；使各种代币之间的兑换与Dapps的支持更见方便

基于Erc20协议的常见代币：USDT, USDC, WBTC, DAI

………………………………………………

以太坊2.0

未完待续

title: DAOTOOL101#6: Real-Time Financing with Superfluid
body:
### Table of Contents

* What is Superfluid?
* Importance of Superfluid
* How to wrap your Crypto?
* How to start a Stream?
* How to claim crypto as a receiver?
* How to cancel an active stream?
* Summary
* FAQ
* Useful links

## What is Superfluid?

Superfluid is a smart contract framework on Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) networks that allows for the easy, secure, and fast transfer of assets In real time based on pre-determined rules set forth in agreements. With only one on-chain transaction, the money will flow directly from your wallet to the receiver's in real time--no further transactions are necessary. Superfluid enables constant token flows on-chain with no capital lockups. Money streams will continue perpetually until cancellation or the sender's balance runs out. Money streams can also have their stream rate updated at any time for even more flexibility.

Super fluid was designed with simplicity and ease-of-use in mind. To get started, all you have to do is select a contributor and input instructions. Then, the protocol will automatically follow the instructions that have been set forth. This makes it easy for everyone to get on board and use the system without any trouble.

**Note**: 

It's important to wrap your crypto in order to streamline payment.

Be careful with how the Cancellation works:

Understand that you **have to cancel the stream before your balance reaches zero or else you will be liquidated and you will lose your buffer(FAQ).**

### Importance of Superfluid

Paying people quickly for their work can help improve productivity by ensuring that there are no delays in payments that could lead to a dip in productivity. In the past, we didn't have the ability to finance contributor compensation in real time, but now we do. This also helps with automation when it comes to making monthly, recurring, or one-time payments.

Even further, a DAO can use superfluid to DCA into investments, liquidity pool or any subscriptions etc in a single transaction, which means no multiple gas fees.

Entering a financial agreement with someone can be a daunting task. Humans are also prone to making mistakes and being dishonest sometimes which can cause financial loss for the other party. Superfluid helps users to transfer assets in a fair and transparent way. A smart contract is deployed by the receiver and the sender transfers assets to an address associated with that contract. The assets are then sent to the receiver according to the predefined rules of the contract. Superfluid takes care of execution and enforcement. It allows users to enjoy the speed of executing a trade while taking care of the complexities so they don't have to.

[https://twitter.com/Superfluid_HQ/status/1551642991214972938?s=20&t=udeOMGTxr6j53kW7deL2VQ](https://twitter.com/Superfluid_HQ/status/1551642991214972938?s=20&t=udeOMGTxr6j53kW7deL2VQ)

### How to wrap your Crypto?

1\. Login to your Gnosis safe account and Go to Apps section

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/56ox3Irkpte3yIUbILFx5.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Search `Superfluid` and Select It

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/R_a6zlQ8EsL1_k_U2shsv.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. Before using a 3rd party app with gnosis, you must read and agree to the Disclaimers and other precautions. Click `Continue` to proceed.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bYDTJIN6w7U7xOSrcmzXr.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. Click on `Continue`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iVhhueHWmEn_V-0R4FvyQ.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. You will be Logged in to the Superfluid Dashboard. Click on `Wrap` 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fcrS2HcvvcubPIdYnkIpR.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. Choose the cryptocurrency you want to wrap and input the amount you want to convert. After that, click on `Upgrade to Super Token`.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/563MJ2XYuFuKxgNqLXaez.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

7\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tEHdKdh-9gdwGRhtD7Xuu.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

8\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/js7hR36DOs-MofbWH82Uo.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

9\. You have Successfully wrapped the Crypto!!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1CXKsA3LMiYnp-vLaZxly.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to start a Stream?

1\. To Start a Stream after you have wrapped the Crypto, go to the left-hand side of your screen and look for the tab labelled `Send Stream`.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MSS62VT9xNsql4D5OWEhF.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Input the details and parameters

Note: Be careful with how the Cancellation works

> I understand that if **I have to cancel the stream before my balance reaches zero or else I will be liquidated and lose my buffer.**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PWkuh8ybzYKdQx4V2Ott5.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. Review and Click on `Send`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0JnrMiN_KS7ZZ8H5fo5La.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/o7g3FYaB4mzFD4zyDZhmM.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JSs_N-nIE0uV6K5gX8CRM.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. You have Successfully Created the Stream!!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w77cWoBuuJ4V0w7mcfyNt.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to claim Crypto as a Receiver?

1\. Head over to the [Official site](https://www.superfluid.finance/home) and Click on `Get Started`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NDqJlrjF5zG8YiHa08Jnp.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

2\. Click on `Go to dashboard`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QgxmYUMya0yn1rzvHnV_d.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. `Connect` your Wallet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xWFVki9BeYd6K9HyOTjP6.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. Select your account and click on `Next`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eagBEbTdOvqlYh-8pcujv.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. Click on `Connect` only after double checking the site URL

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RWtAqS9mfHkcQkjLma26j.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

6\. You will be Logged Into Superfluid. Go to `Wrap/Unwrap` Section

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DhJtXgfsVX-W7flQVp_qU.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

7\. Go to `Unwrap` Section as the receiving Crypto is in Wrapped form(Super token)

Note: My current balance is 1.1212 MATIC

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/C8CeC2ajEmrrDBZusripi.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

8\. Choose the Crypto you want to Unwrap, fill In the amount and then Click on `Downgrade`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rMnz6erne2dF4nVQyT6JJ.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

9\. `Confirm` the Transaction

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tVDQOK8cDvVkQ-FWFZM5z.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

10\. You have successfully Unwrapped and Claimed the Crypto.

You can view It In your Activity History and Wallet

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xQO3_tgw6epAQMyLYmp_m.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### How to cancel an active stream?

1\. To cancel an active stream, select the Super Token In which streaming is happening.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KAeqwgxkWkNa_TTZW_-fR.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

 2. Select the stream you want to cancel and click on `Cancel Stream` 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s1t79zPqD3_1w3uaHgWlm.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

3\. You will be prompted to submit the transaction. Click on `Submit`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tTqKm9uLhpAcO7cp6UQTk.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

4\. `Confirm` the Transaction

**Note:** A transaction will only execute if the required number of Multi sig signers approve it.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3LklJ-JECiJap0ogUcyzg.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

5\. You have successfully Cancelled the stream.

You can view It In your Activity History 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Evobe83ZsdfxwK8AP_bMO.png?height=2304&width=4096&size=large)

### Summary

Superfluid is a blockchain-based platform that makes it easy for DAOs to fund their contributors in a trustless, fast and transparent way. The platform has an easy to use front end that allows for real-time financing and payments using smart contracts.

**FAQ**

* **Which chains is Superfluid deployed to?** 

Deployed on L2s: Polygon, Gnosis chain, Arbitrum, Optimism and Avalanche.

* **What is the deposit when starting the stream?**

  It is an amount equivalent to 4-hours worth of your stream flow rate. It will be locked into the protocol and you will get it back when you close the stream before your wallet balance hits zero. Streams can’t stop themselves automatically, users need to stop them before their balance hits zero. If the user doesn’t stop their stream before their account balance hits zero, they lose the **deposit/buffer.**
* **Why did my stream get liquidated? Why did I lose my deposit?** 

  Streams can’t stop themselves automatically, users need to stop them before their balance hits zero. If the user doesn’t stop their stream before their account balance hits zero, they lose the deposit/buffer.
* **My stream got rejected or failed. What should I do?** 

  Try to follow the steps here: <https://help.superfluid.finance/en/articles/5852994-resolving-transaction-rejected-or-failed-errors> 
* **Can I choose any existing ERC-20 token for a Superfluid stream?** 

  Yes, superfluid is agnostic as to which token you use.

**Useful links**

[Website](https://www.superfluid.finance/home)

[GitHub](https://github.com/superfluid-finance)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/intent/follow?screen_name=Superfluid_HQ)

[Discord](https://discord.com/invite/XsK7nahanQ)

[DOC](https://docs.superfluid.finance/superfluid/)

title: How woke do you want it? A hot take on the Norton Anthology of American Literature's "Preface to the Tenth Edition"
body:
After going to print on the first of this month, the newest version of the Norton Anthology of American Literature was delivered to me by the exceptionally-rude DHL deliveryman today — and, after reading the "Preface to the Tenth Edition," it is clear that this version of the quintessential doorstop promises to be (unsurprisingly) the wokest version yet.

"Diversity" is certainly the keyword, here — given that it is repeated in place of synonyms throughout — as the preface tries to do its job of justifying why you just dropped nearly a couple hundred United States dollars on the Tenth Edition when the Ninth Edition would’ve almost certainly sufficed. 

Of the seventeen new writers included, it isn’t entirely clear from the onset if any of them are white males — not that there is anything resembling an underrepresentation of this demographic in the Anthology — but it is explicitly clear that most, if not all, are Black and/or women and/or Native American and/or Chinese and/or not Caucasian. **Of course, this isn’t inherently problematic!** In fact, it’s presumably more interesting to see the addition of "well-bred" colonial women’s writing in Volume A than more uptight white dudes, and the Modernist period is certainly ripe for today’s uber-woke discussions of identity politics.

Where the preface teeters on the border between the expected liberalism endemic to academia and full-blown wokeness, however, is in its not-so-subtle takes on racism in today’s American landscape. For example, it claims the Reconstruction’s legacy “is still being felt in the national reckoning with racism and inequality” and separately addresses what it defines as “the renewed reckoning with anti-Black racism that began in 2014, arising from shootings of young black men—particularly of Trayvon Martin in 2012 and Michael Brown in 2014.” I’m not saying these two quotes aren’t true or anything, but…

While I admittedly have not read these clusters (the books literally hit my doorstep today), it feels like a mild-to-moderate stretch to claim the United States of America in 2022 — in the midst of Covid-response consequences, an energy crisis, potential food shortages, rapid inflation, a potential recession, a widening wealth gap, political discontent, etc. — is still under any sort of noteworthy influence from 1877 America. (Many Americans probably don’t even know what the Reconstruction is.) 

Likewise, the President of the United States during the shootings of Trayvon Martin and Michael Brown was Barack Obama (not exactly Andrew Johnson), and one might argue that the larger issue at hand had more to do with systemic failings with the American police state/force and mainstream media fire-stoking — themes which I assume are not discussed in Volume E, though I would be happy to be wrong — than an organic resurgence in national racism.

**TL;DR racism certainly exists in today’s America, but it is not black-and-white — there are many sociopolitical factors involved in a deeply complex and diverse country that should not be downplayed. (Maybe they aren’t, to be fair. I haven’t read it, yet.)**

That being said, nothing about the Tenth Edition’s changes is unexpected. They were very expected. It would have been sincerely shocking if the changes to the newest print were not intended to inject more diversity into the Anthology, but it is hard to not laugh at the preface’s somewhat-apologetic balancing by lengthening or adding high school favorites — *The Turn of the Screw* and *The Great Gatsby*, for example — to not "shortchange" the old white guys.

Nevertheless, I assume the trusty ol’ Norton Anthology of American Literature isn’t any worse for wear though the addition of more diverse authors. In fact, I’m almost certain it is better off. What will be interesting, though, are the editorial discussions accompanying each cluster — and whether or not they toe the line of objective study or inject wokeness when they’re explicitly not intended to impose interpretation upon the reader. Time will tell, but I’m betting on the latter.

title: Introducing The Game of Trust
body:
“What happens if you lend to someone and they don’t pay you back?”

You don’t get your money back.

Lending is a game of trust. If you trust the wrong person, you lose.

You can paper it in contracts, take collateral, threaten to deduct points. But the primary game you are playing is one of “should I trust this person?”. All the rest are the mini-games you play after you’ve lost to try and get one extra life.

Now, you might reasonably be thinking, isn’t trust counter to why we’re building DeFi?  Is trustlessness not a core tenet?

### maybe.

A trustless protocol removes the need to trust intermediaries. Which shouldn’t be conflated with the need to remove trust from relationships.

A trusted messaging protocol is handing a note to the student sitting behind you to pass to the new exchange student you have a crush on. You have to trust they’ll pass on the message, not read it or modify it. A trustless protocol would be sliding a note in their locker.

“What happens if you message someone and they don’t message back?”… technology can’t solve that problem.

A credit protocol built to let anyone trust anyone, like [Union](https://union.finance), by nature can’t stop you from trusting someone. That’s the feature.

### Let the Games Begin

A much more interesting question is what happens if you trust someone and they do pay you back. What can we build on that?

We all go through life trusting people every day, and for the most part, it works out. This is optimistic but isn’t naivety. All human civilizations were built on a foundation of local inter-community credit first, with money and professional lenders pretty recent inventions.

A significant hurdle is that “deciding who is credit worthy” is seen as this complex divination, that only the most quantitative of bankers supported by an army of data collection can do with any measure of success.

And rather than try to convince you with fancy words, we built **[TrustFallGa.me ](https://TrustFallGa.me)**- an open world, multiplayer strategy game with competitive and cooperative modes, where you can try for yourself. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Iq3Ya2VwhXkBMK5fpOZj1.png?height=516&width=1300)

### How to Play the Game:

1. Mint the NFT to signal you’re playing. (It’s 0.01 ETH to add a bit of friction for Sybil)
2. [Become a Union protocol member on Arbitrum](https://arbitrum.union.finance) if you’re not already
3. Each Round the Top 50 according to that rounds “Game” will get a vouch equal to the prize pool multiplied by their share of the points.
4. Round 1’s game is “Convince players who also have the game NFT to vouch for you.”  with a \[$2,000 prize pool\]. 
5. Round 2 is a surprise TBA  with the theme of “Money”  \[$3,000\]
6. The Finale is also a surprise building on round 1 & 2 and will have the theme of Betrayal \[$5,000\]

**When does it begin?** 

* Round 1: July 29   → August 12 
* Round 2: August 13 → August 27
* Final Round: August 28 → September 11 

All rounds begin and end at 1620 GMT. And if you’re reading this in the future not having done round 1, 2 or it’s halfway through. Dont worry, you can join in at any time. 

### How to win?

TLDR: Don’t lose.

At a high-level, points will be allocated based on a reasonably fair formula that takes each round’s game activity as input, and uses a similar algorithm to what Gitcoin uses for Quadratic funding to give reasonably fair scores.

The only real rules are  **1)**Don’t exploit bugs in the contracts (you’ll make more $ reporting them) **2)**Points are tallied off-chain, and we reserve the right to remove any badly done Sybil attacks. **3)**Have fun with it!

Beyond that, there are no rules.  

\~written with ♥ by Trustfall.eth


---

### --Mini FAQ--

**How do I find other players?** To make it easier for players to find each other we set up a [token-gated telegram](https://guild.xyz/trustfall-players-lobby). If you have any questions, that’s also a good place to ask.

**How do I get people to trust(re:vouch) for me?** That is the question. [Ncase.me/trust](https://ncase.me/trust/) has a few good strategies. Bribery is always an option. 

**I’d like to report bugs or help improve the game, wheres the repo?** [unioncredit/trustfall](https://github.com/unioncredit/trustfall)

**I have questions about Union protocol or am having trouble becoming a member?** The best place to get Union specific questions answered is on the [Union community discord](https://discord.gg/DWF29rjRJH).

**Does this really count as a game?** There’s points, prizes, and potential for meta-games, what more could you want from a game.

**What’s the NFT token address?** 0xafb9E64d8B84C20E21299E0468d57FCC04F14Acd

**I’m a decentralized autonomous organism am i allowed to compete?** of course! DAO’s, contracts, humans, robots, lawyers, are all allowed.

title: How woke do you want it? A hot take on the Norton Anthology of American Literature's "Preface to the Tenth Edition"
body:
After going to print on the first of this month, the newest version of the Norton Anthology of American Literature was delivered to me by the exceptionally-rude DHL deliveryman today — and, after reading the "Preface to the Tenth Edition," it is clear that this version of the quintessential doorstop promises to be (unsurprisingly) the wokest version yet.

"Diversity" is certainly the keyword, here — given that it is repeated in place of synonyms throughout — as the preface tries to do its job of justifying why you just dropped nearly a couple hundred United States dollars on the Tenth Edition when the Ninth Edition would’ve almost certainly sufficed.

Of the seventeen new writers included, it isn’t entirely clear from the onset if any of them are white males — not that there is anything resembling an underrepresentation of this demographic in the Anthology — but it is explicitly clear that most, if not all, are Black and/or women and/or Native American and/or Chinese and/or not Caucasian. **Of course, this isn’t inherently problematic!** In fact, it’s presumably more interesting to see the addition of "well-bred" colonial women’s writing in Volume A than more uptight white dudes’, and the Modernist period is certainly ripe for today’s uber-woke discussions of identity politics.

Where the preface teeters on the border between the expected liberalism endemic to academia and full-blown wokeness, however, is in its not-so-subtle takes on racism in today’s American landscape. For example, it claims the Reconstruction’s legacy “is still being felt in the national reckoning with racism and inequality” and separately addresses what it defines as “the renewed reckoning with anti-Black racism that began in 2014, arising from shootings of young black men—particularly of Trayvon Martin in 2012 and Michael Brown in 2014.” I’m not saying these two quotes aren’t true or anything, but…

While I admittedly have not read these clusters (the books literally hit my doorstep today), it feels like a mild-to-moderate stretch to claim the United States of America in 2022 — in the midst of Covid-response consequences, an energy crisis, potential food shortages, rapid inflation, a potential recession, a widening wealth gap, political discontent, etc. — is still under any sort of noteworthy influence from 1877 America. (Many Americans probably don’t even know what the Reconstruction is.)

Likewise, the President of the United States during the shootings of Trayvon Martin and Michael Brown was Barack Obama (not exactly Andrew Johnson), and one might argue that the larger issue at hand had more to do with systemic failings with the American police state/force and mainstream media fire-stoking — themes which I assume are not discussed in Volume E, though I would be happy to be wrong — than an organic resurgence in national racism.

**TL;DR racism certainly exists in today’s America, but it is not black-and-white — there are many sociopolitical factors involved in a deeply complex and diverse country that should not be downplayed. (Maybe they aren’t, to be fair. I haven’t read it, yet.)**

That being said, nothing about the Tenth Edition’s changes is unexpected. They were very expected. It would have been sincerely shocking if the changes to the newest print were not intended to inject more diversity into the Anthology, but it is hard to not laugh at the preface’s somewhat-apologetic balancing by lengthening or adding high school favorites — *The Turn of the Screw* and *The Great Gatsby*, for example — to not "shortchange" the old white guys.

Nevertheless, I assume the trusty ol’ Norton Anthology of American Literature isn’t any worse for wear though the addition of more diverse authors. In fact, I’m almost certain it is better off. What will be interesting, though, are the editorial discussions accompanying each cluster — and whether or not they toe the line of objective study or inject wokeness when they’re explicitly not intended to impose interpretation upon the reader. Time will tell, but I’m betting on the latter.

title: 第一个全链DEX在星际之门上推出
body:
在星际之门之上推出SushiXSwap，这是第一个真正的全链分散式交易所，现已上线。

要了解网络之间全链原生资产互换和转移的飞跃有多大，我们需要了解不久前跨链的现状。

DeFi在2020年夏天首次大幅繁荣，当时治理代币创新为用户提供了机会和激励，通过在以太坊网络上新推出的分散式应用程序（dApps）上种植产量来赚取超大的APY。

在以太坊取得成功后，出现了许多链和扩容方法，以满足DeFi农场需求的激增。每个生态系统的成功都取决于在分散、安全性和可扩展性之间找寻平衡。

随着竞争的DeFi生态系统领域不断扩大，用户找到了跨链以寻求更多营收的方法。

### 建造桥梁，烧掉桥梁

快进到2022年。10多条链的331个收益聚合器，TVL总计为83亿美元，在争夺用户和流动性。dApps在基础设施支离破碎的新链上激增，引发了第一代跨链桥梁。

桥梁设计的主要方法包括将原生代币锁定在链A拥有的智能合约中，并在链B上铸造桥拥有的wrapped代币，然后在链B上燃烧wrapped代币，并在链A上兑换锁定的原生代币。

设计上，第一代桥梁只解决了桥接三难困境的三个关键属性之一——提供统一的流动性，但不提供原生资产交易，并立即保证最终性。桥接三难题由三个基本的桥接属性组成，如果没有潜在的通用消息层，这些属性是无法实现的：

**1.即时保证最终性：**为从源链发送的任何交易预先保证目标链上有足够的资金

**2.统一流动性：**流动性分布在多个链上，任何dApp或用户都可以作为单个流动性池访问

**3.原生资产：**源链和目标链上原生存在的资产交易

想要将链A上的令牌交换为链B上的另一个令牌的跨链者别无选择，只能在一些非常可怕的过程中挣扎，例如：

\*复杂的20+点击多事务桥接程序

\*在多个用户界面之间跳转以进行一次交换

\*通过持有第三方包装的代币来承担交易对手的风险

\*在两个代币标准下，用两个代币来收取两条链条的Gas Fee

不仅如此，危险的设计决策使许多最大的传统桥梁变得脆弱，而且大多数桥梁都遭受了大规模的黑客攻击。仅在2022年上半年，就有超过10亿美元的资产从桥牌拥有的智能合约中被盗。

用户对桥接的麻烦感到沮丧，并对黑客和漏洞造成的损失造成破坏。开发人员需要重新获得社区的信任，同时提供跨链的流动性，同时不牺牲其应用程序的安全性。

一定有更好的方法来跨链。

2022年春天，星际之门作为第一座用新型∆（Delta）算法解决桥接三难题的全链桥。星际之门完全可以跨链组合，可以轻松扩展到任意数量的链条，并为每笔交易提供统一的原生资产流动性和即时的终局保证。

### 全链可组合性

星际之门可以一键将任何链条上的任何资产交换为任何其他链条上的任何资产。比如用户想在非Stargate上构建的DEX上把以太坊上的DAI转到Polygon上的AAVE。

他们必须将钱包连接到以太坊主网，前往DEX，将DAI交换到USDC，因为Polygon上没有DAI，找到第一代桥梁将USDC交换到包装版本（wrapped USDC），在Metamask上连接到Polygon，桥接并支付费用，在BNB链上找到一个带有成对的wrapped USDC池的AMM来交换AAVE并支付费用。然后，为了从Mainnet取回代币，他们又做得一遍这样的流程。

SushiXSwap基于Stargate，允许用户在源链的一笔交易中从以太坊上的DAI切换到Polygon上的AAVE，而无需离开Sushi的界面。用户可以一次性支付源链和目标链Gas费用，并在一笔交易中为目标链的未来Gas费用提供额外资产。

星际之门基于LayerZero的通用消息协议，旨在使跨链的可组合性变得简单和安全。跨链可组合桥可以直接与任何链上的任何dApp集成。从用户那里抽象桥梁过程，以消除自己做的风险、工作和压力。

星际之门不仅通过简化复杂而乏味的桥接程序到dApp，使用户的生活更轻松，还用∆算法简化了开发人员平衡单独的跨链池所需的工作和资源。

### 按需分配跨链流动性

Sushi推出的SushiXSwap使其成为第一个使用星际之门随时从任何链获得单一流动性池的DEX。这通过抽象复杂性简化了开发人员和用户的生活。

星际之门使开发人员可以获得充足高效的流动性池，而无需承担维持LP的开销，并加快核心开发周期，同时允许用户获得原生资产。

通过自动化dApps的跨链库存管理，并按需提供对流动性的获取，Stargate消除了dApps为排放提供资金或维持的需求，以激励许多链的LP。

### 为Web3解锁全链DeFi

Stargate通过提供可组合的桥接器扩展了所有dApp的功能，该桥接器无需修改现有代码即可改善用户体验。寿司使用星际之门进行交换，但还有许多其他常见功能随着全链的可组合性而改进，例如：

\*寻求跨链最省资本的互换途径的订单簿路由

\*轻松重新平衡dApps的内部库存和多个链上的流动性

\*以资产为中心、链式不可知论设计和用户界面的钱包

\*跨链漫游寻求LP最佳回报的收益聚合器

dApps正在竞相成为他们中的第一个为用户提供使用强大的∆算法在星际之门上构建的额外好处。全链AMM、钱包、收益聚合器和借贷dApps将首先提供：

\*流动性分布在多个链条上，可以作为单个池获取

\*源链和目的地链的Gas费用在一笔交易中预先支付

\*执行多个操作的单击事务（兑换>桥>兑换）

\*数学上保证到达目标链的交易

星际之门创造的范式转变是双重的：

它需要为用户弄清楚如何安全、正确地与另一条链桥接，而不同担心跨链的安全性，也不用耗费大量思考。

它把开发人员从一个他们必须编码桥梁和维护跨链流动性的世界带到一个按需可用的自动再平衡统一流动性的世界。

了解有关如何使用Stargate使您的dApp现代化的更多信息，查看我们的文档，并在Twitter、Telegram和Discord上加入我们的社区。

[https://twitter.com/stargatefinance](https://twitter.com/stargatefinance)

[https://t.me/joinchat/LEM0ELklmO1kODdh](https://t.me/joinchat/LEM0ELklmO1kODdh)

[https://stargate.finance/discord](https://stargate.finance/discord)

*感谢Shah Hafizi*

SushiXSwap基于Stargate，允许用户在源链的一笔交易中从以太坊上的DAI切换到Polygon上的AAVE，而无需离开Sushi的界面。用户可以一次性支付源链和目标链Gas费用，并在一笔交易中为目标链的未来Gas费用提供额外资产。

星际之门基于LayerZero的通用消息协议，旨在使跨链的可组合性变得简单和安全。跨链可组合桥可以直接与任何链上的任何dApp集成。从用户那里抽象桥梁过程，以消除自己做的风险、工作和压力。

星际之门不仅通过简化复杂而乏味的桥接程序到dApp，使用户的生活更轻松，还用∆算法简化了开发人员平衡单独的跨链池所需的工作和资源。

### 按需分配跨链流动性

Sushi推出的SushiXSwap使其成为第一个使用星际之门随时从任何链获得单一流动性池的DEX。这通过抽象复杂性简化了开发人员和用户的生活。

星际之门使开发人员可以获得充足高效的流动性池，而无需承担维持LP的开销，并加快核心开发周期，同时允许用户获得原生资产。

通过自动化dApps的跨链库存管理，并按需提供对流动性的获取，Stargate消除了dApps为排放提供资金或维持的需求，以激励许多链的LP。

### 为Web3解锁全链DeFi

Stargate通过提供可组合的桥接器扩展了所有dApp的功能，该桥接器无需修改现有代码即可改善用户体验。寿司使用星际之门进行交换，但还有许多其他常见功能随着全链的可组合性而改进，例如：

\*寻求跨链最省资本的互换途径的订单簿路由

\*轻松重新平衡dApps的内部库存和多个链上的流动性

\*以资产为中心、链式不可知论设计和用户界面的钱包

\*跨链漫游寻求LP最佳回报的收益聚合器

dApps正在竞相成为他们中的第一个为用户提供使用强大的∆算法在星际之门上构建的额外好处。全链AMM、钱包、收益聚合器和借贷dApps将首先提供：

\*流动性分布在多个链条上，可以作为单个池获取

\*源链和目的地链的Gas费用在一笔交易中预先支付

\*执行多个操作的单击事务（兑换>桥>兑换）

\*数学上保证到达目标链的交易

星际之门创造的范式转变是双重的：

它需要为用户弄清楚如何安全、正确地与另一条链桥接，而不同担心跨链的安全性，也不用耗费大量思考。

它把开发人员从一个他们必须编码桥梁和维护跨链流动性的世界带到一个按需可用的自动再平衡统一流动性的世界。

了解有关如何使用Stargate使您的dApp现代化的更多信息，查看我们的文档，并在Twitter、Telegram和Discord上加入我们的社区。

[https://twitter.com/stargatefinance](https://twitter.com/stargatefinance)

[https://t.me/joinchat/LEM0ELklmO1kODdh](https://t.me/joinchat/LEM0ELklmO1kODdh)

[https://stargate.finance/discord](https://stargate.finance/discord)

*感谢Shah Hafizi*

title: Introducing The Game of Trust
body:
“What happens if you lend to someone and they don’t pay you back?”

You don’t get your money back.

Lending is a game of trust. If you trust the wrong person, you lose.

You can paper it in contracts, take collateral, threaten to deduct points. But the primary game you are playing is one of “should I trust this person?”. All the rest are the mini-games you play after you’ve lost to try and get one extra life.

Now, you might reasonably be thinking, isn’t trust counter to why we’re building DeFi?  Is trustlessness not a core tenet?

### maybe.

A trustless protocol removes the need to trust intermediaries. Which shouldn’t be conflated with the need to remove trust from relationships.

A trusted messaging protocol is handing a note to the student sitting behind you to pass to the new exchange student you have a crush on. You have to trust they’ll pass on the message, not read it or modify it. A trustless protocol would be sliding a note in their locker.

“What happens if you message someone and they don’t message back?”… technology can’t solve that problem.

A credit protocol built to let anyone trust anyone, like [Union](https://union.finance), by nature can’t stop you from trusting someone. That’s the feature.

### Let the Games Begin

A much more interesting question is what happens if you trust someone and they do pay you back. What can we build on that?

We all go through life trusting people every day, and for the most part, it works out. This is optimistic but isn’t naivety. All human civilizations were built on a foundation of local inter-community credit first, with money and professional lenders pretty recent inventions.

A significant hurdle is that “deciding who is credit worthy” is seen as this complex divination, that only the most quantitative of bankers supported by an army of data collection can do with any measure of success.

And rather than try to convince you with fancy words, we built **[TrustFallGa.me](https://TrustFallGa.me)** - an open world, multiplayer strategy game with competitive and cooperative modes, where you can try for yourself.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Iq3Ya2VwhXkBMK5fpOZj1.png?height=516&width=1300)

### How to Play the Game:

1. [Mint the NFT](https://trustfallga.me) to signal you’re playing. (It’s 0.01 ETH to add a bit of friction for Sybil)
2. [Become a Union protocol member on Arbitrum](https://arbitrum.union.finance) if you’re not already
3. Each round has a specific *activity* you can do to collect points. At the end of the round, point are tallied and the Top 50 will get a vouch proportional to their share of the points.
4. Round 1’s game is “Convince players who also have the game NFT to vouch for you.”  with a \[$2,000 prize pool\]. Seems straightforward, until you ask why would my competition vouch for me?!
5. Round 2’s game is a surprise with the theme of “Money”  \[$3,000\]
6. The Finale is also a surprise building on round 1 & 2 and will have the theme of Betrayal \[$5,000\]

**When does it begin?**

* Round 1: July 29   → August 12
* Round 2: August 13 → August 27
* Final Round: August 28 → September 11

All rounds begin and end at 1620 GMT. And if you’re reading this in the future not having done round 1, 2 or it’s halfway through. Dont worry, you can join in at any time.

### How to win?

TLDR: Don’t lose.

At a high-level, points will be allocated based on a reasonably fair formula that takes each round’s game activity as input, and uses a similar algorithm to what Gitcoin uses for Quadratic funding to give reasonably fair scores.

The only real rules are  **1.** Don’t exploit bugs in the contracts (you’ll make more $ reporting them) **2.** Points are tallied off-chain, and we reserve the right to remove any badly done Sybil attacks. **3.** Have fun with it!

Beyond that, there are no rules.

\~written with ♥ by Trustfall.eth


---

### --Mini FAQ--

**How do I find other players?** To make it easier for players to find each other we set up a [token-gated telegram](https://guild.xyz/trustfall-players-lobby). If you have any questions, that’s also a good place to ask.

**How do I get people to trust(re:vouch) for me?** That is the question. [Ncase.me/trust](https://ncase.me/trust/) has a few good strategies. Bribery is always an option.

**I’d like to report bugs or help improve the game, wheres the repo?** [unioncredit/trustfall](https://github.com/unioncredit/trustfall)

**I have questions about Union protocol or am having trouble becoming a member?** The best place to get Union specific questions answered is on the [Union community discord](https://discord.gg/DWF29rjRJH).

**Does this really count as a game?** There’s points, prizes, and potential for meta-games, what more could you want from a game.

**What’s the NFT token address?** 0xafb9E64d8B84C20E21299E0468d57FCC04F14Acd

**I’m a decentralized autonomous organism am i allowed to compete?** of course! DAO’s, contracts, humans, robots, lawyers, are all allowed.

title: 【 初階 】三高有氧運動
body:
## 心肺有氧｜CardioPulmonary

### 🏃 心肺 CardioPulmonary 🏃

> **時長約 10 分鐘 ⌛**

有氧運動能有效降低體脂、保留或增加肌肉組織，類型包含游泳、慢跑、騎腳踏車、快走、有氧墊上運動等。運動的強度，則以「有點累又不會太累」的中等強度為主 😌

今天做的是心肺有氧，建議運動前後須搭配一些伸展運動與緩和運動，以增進身體柔軟度來避免運動傷害的發生，特別在年長者尤其重要。

做運動的時候，請根據自身體能狀況及症狀來選擇影片中的退階動作，像是蹲的部分如果膝蓋不舒服、沒有體力，可以做 1/4 蹲就好！

🙌 10 分鐘高強度間歇循環訓練 
 💁 道具：穿起來活動腳不會滑也不會不舒服的鞋 👟，若光腳可搭配瑜珈墊 🧩，愉快的心 💕

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2p3ua0k_UVE](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2p3ua0k_UVE)

```
Source: 菲特邦FitnFun
```

title: Bestie… y blockchain tho?
body:
A blockchain simply allows us to store and record information in a way that cannot be altered.

Think about the technology we use today. We are in a Web2 world where developers can create a software/code that allows for users (you and me) to use it (think Facebook, IG, Youtube). The people who own the code can dictate how information is stored. They have the ability (if they wanted to) to delete, edit, allow certain values.

**\*\*\* HOT TAKE \*\*\*** (maybe not, but don’t cancel me plz)

Here is a prime example in our recent history: Remember when Donald Trump had a Twitter and he was tweeting things that people didn’t really like? And then Twitter deleted his tweets and banned him from the platform???? This exactly shows how developers can influence the way information is shared. They were able to go into their site, find his account, ban him and delete his stuff. I say hot take because I believe in freedom of speech. I don’t care if it’s from Trump or whoever else. Everyone has the right to say what they want. Twitter doesn’t have a right to suppress it. If they can stop Trump, what other info are people suppressing from us? ...Like GIVE ME ALL THE INFO!! I don’t care if I agree or disagree with it. Let me see it all and make my own informed decision, THANK YOU VERY MUCH. If Twitter was on a blockchain, Trump’s tweet could never be erased.

Blockchain allows for transparency. One cool feature that comes with blockchain is the ability to be a **“trustless”** network.

![…. But wuttttt, wut do u MEAN TRUSTLESS?! 😩](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8mncDN9dh5Ss_14evMX6K.jpeg?height=1164&width=1280)

I’m not talking trustless like our ex boyfriends… as in lacking trust. Trustless as in *not requiring trust* but... we still know they’re faithful.

![EhEhhhhh](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QNw2rkphlSamBH4ul_-xK.jpeg?height=365&width=650)

So let’s slow down.

For example, Fred wants to send Bob $1000. So he goes to his handy dandy Bank of America app, and uses Zelle to try and send his friend $1000. The *bank* is being *TRUSTED* to verify, confirm, and facilitate the sending of $1000 from Fred’s account to Bob’s account. The bank is a central entity that fulfills the “trust role”. When you send your money, you’re 100% sure that the bank isn’t going to rug you and that they verified that Bob and you are legit.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LXfqH7iVF7y6AiBB1yINr.jpeg?height=720&width=1060)

In a blockchain though, there is no person or entity who verifies the validity of a transaction. Because there is a network of computers who all hold the SAME ledger (transaction list… “public bank statement”), *TRUST* is not needed.. it is trust*LESS*. An **intermediary** is basically rendered obsolete (aheh bye bye bank). The mechanisms behind that which runs blockchains allow for you to transact with someone… without knowing them… with no third party.. and no all mighty ruler reigning above. Just a bro to another bro with 100% faith in the legitimacy of it all still (faithful af).

![Not like him though…](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/V_eD5TJGIL-GiZ_VwST1c.jpeg?height=1338&width=2388)

Think about it like this…. You meet up with a friend to give him some cash. You trust your friend will receive your money because well, he’s right in front of your face. Blockchain allows for this type of “peer to peer” transaction but you’re in America and your friend who you’re sending money to, is in Australia... and he’s not even a friend!!! In fact, you don’t even know who he is at all. He’s just some dude who wanted to buy your JPEG. But you’re able to transact with him like you would if you met up in person - with trust and legitimacy.

Since there are multiple copies of the ledger spread out over a network of computers, this means the system has the potential to be decentralized. Meaning not one entity… or big tech company (cough cough) has control over the data. NO ONE CONTROLS THE DATA. This means no more shady business happening behind the scenes that consumers don’t know about. This means full transparency is a GIV 👏 EN 👏. You cannot hide anything on a blockchain. Blockchain technology also means we get to cut out the middlemen and streamline transactions.

Now I say “has the potential to be decentralized” because not all protocols are equal. Some are decentralized with no humans in the mix operating solely from a computer and an algorithm (aka **DEX**- it’s kind of like an “if then” statement where functions only execute when criteria are met). However, some like Binance and Coinbase are centralized, we call these **CEXs** (centralized exchange). They are still using blockchain technology with an immutable ledger. But if they wanted to, they can go in and pull your transaction for you or locate your funds. As they say with CEXs, “*Not your keys, not your coins*”.

![A centralized network is characterized by one entity having more weight over others. It is essentially the government.. controlling and watching over data. It has the ability to manipulate, hide, alter, or pull whatever they see fit (and they don't need to tell you about it)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CYWzVlxNA-tiviivfIB_r.png?height=720&width=1060)

![A decentralized network where all circles are equal wooohooo. No one has weight over anyone else. Data/value is transferred to whoever, whenever, wherever and cannot be hidden or altered. All done with validity and trust too? That's blockchain for u bayyybeeee](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5Xqzyt39Us0sVQjCUQW19.png?height=720&width=1060)

Remember that whole ordeal with GME and how Robinhood halted the trading on it that one time.... yeah kind of like that. Like YOU bought GME but it really wasn’t yours because Robinhood told you you couldn’t sell it. ¯\\*_(ツ)*_/¯ Same applies for CEXs. You buy the asset.. but then again.. not really LOL.

If you look at the centralized graphic up above and replaced the “centralized entity” with Robinhood.. Facebook… TikTok… Twitter… then perhaps you might get a better understanding.

Blockchain is the backbone for all of crypto structures. But it has uses outside of cryptocurrency as well. It is so so so so SO SO SO sooooo very important and such a breakthrough technology in my opinion. It has the potential to disrupt so many of our current systems/industries in the best way possible (wink wink\* there is a reason why there is so much push against it). I wish more people took the time to learn about it instead of just jumping ahead and calling crypto a scam. With the way society is right now... the world.. our leaders... a change is necessary and I truly believe change lies within the adoption of blockchain technology.

Think about our banking industry.. If we utilized blockchain technology, banks would be.. useless. You wouldn’t have to wait to go to the bank Mon-Fri from 8AM-5PM. You wouldn’t need to wait 4 days to wire funds... you wouldn’t be giving your money freely to the banks to lend out to god knows who. Instead, *you* can lend your own money out.. you can BE YOUR OWN BANK. You can borrow, lend, stake, and make your money work for you (this is called **DeFi** AKA decentralized finance) Traditionally, this was something only doable by rich people with cash flow and big connections.

I don’t want to make this too long and hard to digest so that’s it for now. I think I’ll write about some different use cases of blockchain in a later article, so stay tuned for that.

I hope this was a little helpful. I’m not an expert. This is all from my understanding, do take it with a grain of salt and **DYOR** (DO YOUR OWN RESEARCH). If you have any questions... comments.. gripes.. feel free to reach out to me on Twitter ([@theblockchainb](https://twitter.com/theblockchainb))

LUV,

the bb ❤️

**TERMS TO KNOW**

Trustless

Ledger

Intermediary

DEX

CEX

DeFi

DYOR

title: Random fact
body:
Since I've been living in Paris, I've never seen so many transformations. There is a good transformation and a bad transformation. The city of Paris has been dirty and under construction for more than 10 years. I have also never seen so many disappointed tourists in Paris.

![March 2022, near Opéra, Paris.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yezEUl9FVl4CBKDV-B-6L.jpg?height=3889&width=5834&size=large)

This state has existed since the election of Anne Hidalgo as mayor of Paris. In a few months, 50,000 Internet users have also published thousands of #saccageparis posts, often supporting photos, denouncing in turn the filth, the transformation policy of Anne Hidalgo.

One thing to say: stop the carnage.
